description.raw:
This PR addresses [this comment](#!/osrf/cloudsim-widgets/pull-requests/166/set-and-update-user-budget/diff#comment-37094797) on a PR from the `cloudsim-widgets` repository.

Upon posting a new metrics config, an optional `admin_identity` can be passed. If it exists, it gives read/write permissions to it. This is used to grant permission to the `src-admins` identity upon creation, and avoid depending on callbacks to grant that permission.

A new test case was included, to see if the resource is created and the permissions are correctly set. The previous creation test was modified to check that this field does not exists.

ptal @preyna , @chapulina
fyi @andres_fortier
